meanings.definition: The quality or state of being muscular.
meanings.sent1: His muscularity was evident as he effortlessly lifted the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: She admired the muscularity of the athlete's physique.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy tried to imitate the muscularity of the big dog, but ended up just wobbling around.
meanings.sent4: The muscularity of the lion's movements was both graceful and powerful.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's muscularity made him stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: The degree of development of a person's muscles.
meanings.sent1: After months of training, his muscularity had noticeably increased.
meanings.sent2: The bodybuilder's muscularity was a result of dedicated workouts.
meanings.sent3: The clown joked about his lack of muscularity, claiming his muscles were on vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to improve her muscularity was as strong as her muscles.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's muscularity enhanced her performance on stage.
